text: Clonlisk () is a barony in County Offaly (formerly King's County), Republic of Ireland. ==Etymology== Clonlisk derives its name from Clonlisk Castle (near Dunkerrin) and the townland of Clonlisk (Irish Cluain Leisc, "meadow of laziness").Logainm.ie ==Location== Clonlisk is located in southwest County Offaly. ==History== Clonlisk was part of the territory of the Ó Cearbhaill (O'Carroll) of Éile (Ely).Ireland's History in Maps: The Baronies of Ireland ==List of settlements== Below is a list of settlements in Clonlisk: *Brosna *Moneygall *Shinrone ==References== Category:Baronies of County Offaly
title: Clonlisk
